FlavorTextOption.Text: One of our ships has found an amazing Precursor Relic, orbiting the star in a local star system. The Relic's strange energies are diminishing, but the crew thinks they can put it to good use while it lasts.
Excellent, let us allocate all of the power to Research. [COLOR=BenevolentBlue](Benevolent +30, +100% Research for 25 turns)[/COLOR]

I think our best bet would be to divide this power up fairly between our Research and Manufacturing facilities. [COLOR=PragmaticGold](Pragmatic +30, +50% Manufacturing, and Research, for 25 turns)[/COLOR]
Let us use this power to build up our Military and infrastructure. [COLOR=WarRed](Malevolent +30, +100% Manufacturing for 25 turns)[/COLOR]
